relation: The return is the exact reverse of the outbound trip(s), 7 days after the outbound date or last trip.
The return will be the exact reverse of the outbound trip starting on the 15OCT.

textBeforeTable: Click here to display a complete list of available online e-Learning courses.   Introduction Power Products consists of three products to find low fare alternatives. These products are Worldspan Power Pricing®, Worldspan Power Shopper®, and Worldspan Power Quote® (applicable to customers in IATA areas Traffic Conference 2 (TC2) and Traffic Conference 3 (TC3). Power Pricing searches for lower fare alternatives in an existing itinerary. Power Shopper performs searches without an itinerary. Each product requires different entries, but produce similar results. There is a monthly fee, per workstation for Power Products. top of page Activation and Deactivation of Power Products Power Products are activated by entries for each workstation requiring access. Power Shopper is automatically activated when Power Pricing is turned on. The terms and conditions for Power Products should be read prior to activation. These are the entries to activate Power Products. Power Products Introduction Activation and Deactivation of Power Products Billing KGB Displays Power Flight Search - Processing   Examples - SecuRate Air   Processing Power Pricing (PP) - Availability   Options   >
textAfterTable: Power Pricing remains active until the workstation is deactivated. A full month is charged for each workstation with Power Pricing access, regardless of what time of the month it is activated. The entry to deactivate Power Products is shown below. Entry Response 4PLI*DEACTIVATE TO CONFIRM DEACTIVATION      ENTER 4PLI*DEACTIVATION Then reenter the deactivation entry to remove Power Pricing capabilities. Notes about deactivation: Deactivating Power Pricing automatically deactivates Power Shopper. De-installing or disconnecting a workstation does not deactivate Power Pricing or stop the monthly billing charges. If an agency is wanting to deactivate one workstation, then activate another, billing occurs on both workstations for that month. The entries to activate and deactivate the Flex Date and the User Defined Zone options. Entry Response 4PLI*ACTIVATE/FLEX BILLABLE PRODUCT - FLEX ONE DAY PRIOR TO ACTIVATION REVIEW TERMS AND CONDITIONS LOCATED UNDER >INFO FLEX AIRPORTS( TO CONTINUE ACTIVATION ENTER 4PLI*BILLOK/YOUR NAME >4PLI*BILLOK/( 4PLI*BILLOK/XXXXXX XXXXXX is a two to ten character User Name YOU NOW HAVE FLEX DATE BILLING
